SEARCH
Module com.example.project3
Package com.example.project3

Class ClinicManagerController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3.ClinicManagerController
public class ClinicManagerController extends Object
This is a controller class for managing clinic appointments and billing operations. This class handles the scheduling, reschedling, and cancellation of appointments, displaying all appointments and provide billing statements for patient, as well as provider's credits.

    • isValidApptDate

      private boolean isValidApptDate(Date apptDate)
      Helper method: validates if the given appointment date is an acceptable date for scheduling.
      Parameters:
      apptDate - the date to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the appointment date is valid; false otherwise

    • isValidDOB

      private boolean isValidDOB(Date dob)
      Helper method: validates the given date of birth (DOB) to ensure it is a valid date, not today, and not a future date.
      Parameters:
      dob - the date of birth to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the date of birth is valid; false otherwise

    • isDuplicateAppt

      private boolean isDuplicateAppt(Appointment appt)
      Checks if the given appointment already exists in the list of all appointments.
      Parameters:
      appt - The appointment to check.
      Returns:
      true if a duplicate appointment is found; false otherwise.

    • apptDateSelected

      private Date apptDateSelected()
      Event handler that retrieves the selected appointment date from the DatePicker (dp_appointmentDate). Converts the selected date to a Date object and validates it using isValidApptDate().
      Returns:
      A Date object representing the selected appointment date, or null if the date is invalid.

    • dobSelected

      private Date dobSelected()
      Event handler that retrieves the selected date of birth (DOB) from the DatePicker (dp_dob). Converts the selected date to a Date object and validates it using isValidDOB().
      Returns:
      A Date object representing the selected date of birth, or null if the date is invalid.

    • isProviderAvailable

      private boolean isProviderAvailable(Appointment appt)
      Helper method: Checks whether provider is available for a specific appointment
      Parameters:
      appt - the appointment to check
      Returns:
      true if provider is available, false otherwise

    • areScheduleFieldsValid

      private boolean areScheduleFieldsValid()
      Checks if all required fields for scheduling an appointment are filled. Validates appointment date, DOB, timeslot, first name, and last name. For imaging visits, checks that a room type is selected; for office visits, ensures a provider is selected.
      Returns:
      true if all fields are valid; false otherwise.

    • scheduleOfficeAppointment

      private void scheduleOfficeAppointment()
      Schedules an office appointment if all required fields are valid.

    • isRoomAvailable

      private boolean isRoomAvailable(Technician assignedTech, Timeslot requestTimeslot, Location location, Radiology requestRoom)
      Helper method: check the imaging room is available.
      Returns:
      true if available, otherwise false.

    • isTechAvailable

      private boolean isTechAvailable(Technician tech, Date requestDate, Timeslot requestTimeslot)
      Helper method: Checks if a technician is available on a specific date and timeslot.
      Parameters:
      tech - The technician to check.
      requestDate - The requested appointment date.
      requestTimeslot - The requested timeslot.
      Returns:
      true if the technician is available; false otherwise.

    • findAvailableTech

      private Technician findAvailableTech(Date requestDate, Timeslot requestTimeslot, Radiology requestRoom)
      Helper method: Finds the next available technician from the rotation list to help schedule imaging appointment
      Parameters:
      requestDate - The date of the requested appointment.
      requestTimeslot - The timeslot of the requested appointment.
      requestRoom - The type of radiology room required for the appointment.
      Returns:
      The available Technician who can fulfill the request, or null if none are available.

      Schedule imaging appointments if all require fields are valid.

      void sortBySelected(String sortOption)
      Displays all appointments in the ListView based on the selected sorting option. Defaults to sorting by "Patient" if the option is unrecognized.
      Parameters:
      sortOption - The selected sorting criteria ("Patient", "Date", or "Location").
